name: A Miming Whiz Quiz | Word Play | 10 Questions

questions.text:
Example: Splinter, wing, dumber, bottom.

Answer: Seasons

These words rhyme with winter, spring, summer, and autumn, respectively.  Since these are all seasons, that is the answer.

Doubt, gammon, shoal, laguna
questions.explanation:
Fish & fishes.

	Doubt - troutGammon - salmonShoal - soleLaguna - tuna

Bear & Bears.

	Ton - SunPlaque - BlackBowler - PolarZodiac - Kodiak

questions.correct: Language & Languages & Foreign languages & Foreign language
questions.explanation:
Language & Languages & Foreign languages & Foreign language.

	Pygmalion - ItalianVermin - GermanBench - FrenchBanish - Spanish

Countries & Country.

	Tails - WalesPants - FranceCrane - Spain or UkraineSilly - Chile

questions.correct: Organs & Organ & Body part & Body parts
questions.explanation:
Organs & Organ & Body part & Body parts.

	Mean - spleenQuiver - liverChatter - bladderPane - brain

Color & Colors & Colour & Colours.

	Diane - cyanEyelet - violetShoo - blueMacaroon - maroon

Bands & Band.

	Peru - La RouxAnchovy - Bon JoviScreen - QueenCart - Heart

Cities & City.

	Kidney - Sydney, AustraliaMuscles - Brussels, BelgiumFoam - Rome, ItalySavannah - Havana, Cuba I'm sorry if you got this question wrong by saying "capitals" or "capital cities", but Sydney isn't the capital of Australia, Canberra is.

Fruit & Fruits.

	Chair - pearDumb - plumCrepes - grapesTango - mango

President & Presidents.

	Soak - PolkLaughed - TaftMaze - HayesHuman - Truman
